alert.note: Alert for Northern Clinton; Northern Lycoming; Potter; Tioga (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 11:54AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A GUSTY SHOWER WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN LYCOMING...EASTERN POTTER...WESTERN TIOGA AND CLINTON COUNTIES THROUGH 1245 PM EDT... At 1153 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gusty shower along a line extending from Ulysses to Cherry Springs to Keating. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Keating, Elkland, Renovo, Galeton, Westfield, Gaines, South Renovo, Cross Fork, Glen Union, Harrison Valley, Leonard Harrison State Park, Denton Hill State Park, Tamarack, Kettle Creek State Park, Cedar Run, Cammal, Ole Bull State Park, Lyman Run State Park, Westport and Leetonia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Clinton; Northern Lycoming; Potter; Tioga
